info.name: Image Rename
info.summary: Rename Images starting with "IMG" to match the date they were created
info.description:
You cannot change the way iOS names images. All images start with IMG and a counter is added. If you store images from multiple sources in one folder (e.g. a shared family picture folder), there will be name collisions and nobody will be able to tell when the picture was taken just by looking at the file name.
This plugin uses the meta information of a picture and changes the file name to something more useful.
info.author: Christian Baer
